jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Analyse the requirements to implement new website features in the Back-end 
● Designing & Implementing Data Model/Structure to enable dynamic data for website 
● Implementing & Maintaining the Website with CMS/Portal 
● Implementing & Monitoring API services for web 
● Reviewing codes before deploying process
jobsJson.description:
● Analyse the requirements to implement new website features in the Back-end
● Designing & Implementing Data Model/Structure to enable dynamic data for website
● Implementing & Maintaining the Website with CMS/Portal
● Implementing & Monitoring API services for web
● Reviewing codes before deploying process
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Other Tools/ Service:
  • Programming Language:
  • Python
  • Javascript
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Shell Scripting with Bash (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Database:
  • PostgreSQL
  • ElasticSearch (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Redis (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Editor:
  • Sublime Text
  • Nano or Vi (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Queueing:
  • RabbitMQ for Message Queuing (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Celery for Distributed Task Queuing (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Django - Python web framework
  • AWS Services (API Gateway, S3 & CloudFront) (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Web Server Tools:
  • NGINX
  • UWSGI (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Source Version Control:
  • git
  • QA Engineering:
  • Unit Testing with Django (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Selenium for Functional/Acceptance Testing (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Miscsellaneous:
  • REST API Framework using Tastypie on Django (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • JIRA
  • Google Docs
  • Slack
  • Gitlab (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Internationalization with Django (i18n) (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Zendesk API (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
  • Salesforce API (not mandatory -- is a plus if they had)
